body.name: ZOMEI Tripod 74” Camera Tripod, Aluminum Professional Heavy Duty Camera Tripod Stand, Tripod for Camera DSLR SLR with Carry Bag, Compatible with iPhone, Projector, Webcam, Spotting Scopes（Red）
body.stockDetail: Only 11 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 29 mins
features: 【 Multi-functional extension design】The tripod can shrink to a minimum of 20.1 inches and extend to a maximum of 74 inches, This tripod fully adapts to a range of different user heights and enables you to compose your photos more creatively than ever before.

【 Multi-angle Shooting】 The compact camera tripod is equipped with a stable smooth ergonomic 3-way pan head: headlock, pan lock, and tilt lock, which can satisfy all the needs of vertical, horizontal, and overhead photography, etc. You can freely adjustable angles for 360° panoramic shooting, 180°up and down shooting, and 90°vertical portrait. When you employ pans and tilts during photo or video recording, the tripod offers superb stability and gives you excellent, smooth results.

【 Widely Application】The heavy duty 74 inch camera tripod is suitable for photographing events and video recordings such as selfies, family portrait photos, parties, traveling, hiking, sports, YouTube, Vlog, video conferencing, online meetings, live streaming, recording games, yoga videos, outside with wind, and other activities indoors and outdoors. 3-position leg angle adjustment system helps you take photos flexibly for different scenarios and photography conditions.

【What can you get! 】It comes with 1x portable carrying bag , 1x 360° Rotating Phone Holder,1x Instruction Manual. With 2 years warranty，One year free replacement from our store and 24 hours of mail service.We can solve any problem for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent surfing photography tripod
reviews.reviewText: I am using the tripod for taking surfing photos and I am more than happy with it…very sturdy and stable…the rotation is smooth as silk when following a surfer screaming down the line…high quality for a low price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does the job.
reviews.reviewText: Brought this for a friend, I can say it looks and feel a little cheap, but at least it works. But it’s very delicate. Not for children. I definitely won’t buy again. But it’s ok , and I still recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent prosumer option for budding phtographers
reviews.reviewText: This is my first tripod in this "prosumer" type of category. This seems like a very happy middle ground between lighter weight or entry level tripods, and the too-expensive true professional units.The overall sturdiness is excellent. My previous tripod, I was happy to use my phone or a gopro on top, but this here is also stable and reliable enough to go with a real camera or camcorder as well. The overall feel of it is confidence-inspiring. The adjustments are straightforward and lock in well. Smooth action. Versatile angling.The included phone mount is simple but nice. It has more padding than the one included with my previous tripod, and offers more protection for the phone. I don't have to worry about scuffs and scratches. Highly appreciated.VERDICT:Very nice overall. It will not compete with 100 USD+ tripods, but as an entry point into "real, good" photography gear, it's a good value recommendation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Extremely stable, extends and sets up easily, and doesn't weigh much. Great addition to my set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Can't beat it for the price
reviews.reviewText: Just started using this and so far so good. Versatile and stable as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok tripod, terrible head
reviews.reviewText: Tripod is about as good as you could expect at this range. It is very light, folds pretty compact but it is simply not sturdy enough to trust it with anything more than action camera or a phone.If you want to stick a small/medium sized dslr rig on it i would look for something else. I do like they way it looks though. Extremely nice shade of orange fits the black accents.Head is absolutely terrible, it is plastic, not smooth at all and small or smooth adjustments are straight impossible to achieve.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unusually Tall Tripod
reviews.reviewText: I have to admit that I was expecting to be disappointed. This tripod is over 80% plastic; however, I was pleasantly surprised regarding the engineering of the plastic parts. The leg clamps work great, the swivel and pivot lock positively and the locking collar for the footprint spread works really good. The trapezoid shaped legs are constructed of four segments of aluminum. This is very unusual as most tripods consist of three segmented legs. The end of the tripod legs can be fitted with (supplied) rubber pivoting feet. The rubber feet seem to be adjustable for making micro adjustments for a solid, level, camera platform. The tripod has a built in 360 degree level to help achieve a true horizontal perspective without tilt. With the legs fully extended and the platform to the full height, this tripod can be adjusted unusually high. The set up is so high that this tripod could be used for a white refraction umbrella. The tripod can be adjusted to have a very wide footprint to help stabilize it when heavy equipment is attached to it. There is even an inverted hook for hanging a small sandbag for further support in windy conditions. Although I'm not a big fan of plastic, this tripod has obviously been designed by someone in the professional photography industry. There are almost infinite adjustment options, and those adjustments stay put when you tighten them down. I almost forgot to mention that this also comes with an adapter to hold your cell phone as if it was a SLR Camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Tripod, works great with FLIR camera
reviews.reviewText: I use this tripod as a replacement for one I had a FLIR camera on for my home golf simulator. This tripod works great, it feels well built and honestly feels the same as some 80$+ Tripods I have bought in the past. The tripod is pretty light weight, around 3 lbs, has 4 levels of adjustment on each leg (usually I feel like tripods only have 3) the feet at the bottom are anti-slip with a rubber material, and the areas where you would grab the tripod to move it around have a nice soft foam padding on them. There are some touch points like the handle for articulation that are just plastic and could feel a bit better, but for the price I completely am fine with it and will continue using this as long as it holds up.

Das Stativ macht einen stabilen Eindruck. Man kann es beschweren mit einem Gewicht. Für das wofür ich es brauche, ist das aber nicht notwendig.Das schnell einspannen. Der handyhalterung funktioniert tadellos und die Feder ist stark genug. Ich benutze sie mit einem Google Pixel 6 pro.Das Stativ steht stabil. Jedoch die Möglichkeit mit der Kurbel noch mal ein Stück hochzufahren, würde ich sein lassen, denn dieses Stück ist etwas gargellig.Beim zusammenbauen( die Füsse einschrauben) sollten sie eine wasserpumpenzange oder ähnliches zur Hand haben, denn ab einem gewissen Grad wird es sehr schwer und das ist nicht mehr mit den Fingern zu schaffen.Nach dem ersten praxistest werde ich eventuell die Rezession verändern oder noch mal bestätigen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Delivery very fast and quality is the best of the price

reviews.reviewText: Léger, impression peu solide... Pas top pour lunettes optique. Le pied trop léger "cliquotte".Manivelle et visses plastique ne donnent pas sensation de solidité. Ok pour petit appareil photo Compact.
